test_scenarios.name: Change Readiness Assessment
test_scenarios.input: Assess our organization's readiness to implement a new CRM system. We have 500 employees, previous IT projects have had mixed success, and leadership is supportive but middle management is skeptical.
test_scenarios.validation: Response includes readiness score, identifies leadership support as strength, middle management as gap, provides recommendations

test_scenarios.name: Stakeholder Mapping
test_scenarios.input: Map stakeholders for our ERP implementation: CEO (sponsor), CFO (budget owner), IT Director (implementer), Department Heads (users), Front-line staff (end users)
test_scenarios.validation: Response uses Power/Interest grid, provides engagement strategy for each stakeholder

test_scenarios.name: Adoption Planning
test_scenarios.input: Create an adoption plan for rolling out Microsoft Teams to replace Slack across our 1,000 person organization over 6 months
test_scenarios.validation: Response includes phased rollout, training approach, communication plan, success metrics

test_scenarios.name: Route to CST
test_scenarios.input: What frameworks should I use to analyze this organizational change?
test_scenarios.validation: Framework selection routed to CST, not handled by CHG

test_scenarios.name: Kotter 8-Step Application
test_scenarios.input: Guide me through using Kotter's 8-step model for our digital transformation initiative
test_scenarios.validation: Response references all 8 steps with specific guidance for digital transformation context

test_scenarios.name: Resistance Management
test_scenarios.input: Our sales team is resisting the new CRM. How do we address this resistance?
test_scenarios.validation: Response identifies resistance sources and provides mitigation strategies

test_scenarios.name: ADKAR Assessment
test_scenarios.input: Use the ADKAR model to assess where our employees are stuck in adopting the new expense system
test_scenarios.validation: Response assesses each ADKAR element and identifies the blocker stage

test_scenarios.name: Training Plan Development
test_scenarios.input: Design a training approach for our new data analytics platform rollout to 200 marketing analysts
test_scenarios.validation: Response includes learning objectives, delivery methods, schedule, and assessment approach

test_scenarios.name: Communication Planning
test_scenarios.input: Help me create a change communication plan for announcing our office relocation
test_scenarios.validation: Response includes messaging framework, channels, timing, and audience segmentation

test_scenarios.name: Change Sustainment
test_scenarios.input: Our new process was implemented 3 months ago but people are reverting to old ways. How do we sustain the change?
test_scenarios.validation: Response includes reinforcement strategies, metrics monitoring, and continuous improvement
